name: Ubel Island
description:
The world is near doom. You found out that the source of all misery is a remote island on which an ancient being resides. This being is called the Ubel.  Out of despair you set sails and arrive on the island. There is no way back until the Ubel is slain.

The Ubel is strong. Too strong. Weaken it first by destroying its eyes. Your compass will lead you...

It is strongly recommended to play this with a gamepad. If you want to play with a keyboard, the controls are:

Arrow Keys : Move

Z/Y : Use Weapon 1

X : Use Weapon 2

I : Inventory

The gamepad support was only tested with XBOX controllers.
